name: blue-shrimp-51
author: Yaya12085
description: blue-shrimp-51 组件 (button, animation, gradient, interactive)

uniapp.template:
<button class="btn"></button>
  <view></view>
    <defs>
        <linearGradient id="gradiant">
            <stop stop-color="#FF8282" offset="0%"></stop>
            <stop stop-color="#E178ED" offset="100%"></stop>
        </linearGradient>
    </defs>
     <rect height="50" width="150" stroke="url(#gradiant)" fill="none"></rect>
  </svg>
    <text>Button</text>
</button>
